attributes.action: Say no to the proposed housing developments on land at Etherley Moor.
attributes.background: Sign this petition if you are against the proposed build of at least 550 houses on green fields at Etherley Moor.  Consider increased traffic, road safety, lack of spaces in educational establishments, public transport, loss of green space, ecological effects on the environment & more.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
